title: how to use visa gift card  at league of legends
body: how to use visa gift card  at league of legends is 25$

replies.body:
Those visa gift cards should be entered in as if it was a normal debit card! When you click Purchase RP, make sure the top option is selected and enter the information in as it appears on the card you have. 

If you have any problems along the way, feel free to reach back out to me or hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
